Similar claims about the benefits of coc: with examples found on Indian Facebook pages and Twitter.
Expert organizations such as the World H: the International Vaccine Institute, and the University of the Philippines’ National Institutes of Health have all stated that the claim is false, as there is no evidence to support the idea that coconut oil can prevent or cure dengue.
